input.sentences: [male] and [female] hosted their annual halloween party .
[male] came dressed as a smurf killer .
the gang had a good time relaxing and hanging out .
[female] won the prize money for best costume .
everyone had a great time and [male] begged them to do it again next year .
output.sentences: A male friend of my brother hosted a party and I was invited!
One male dressed up as a psycho killer and carried a smurf for laughs.
A lot of us just spent time relaxing and hanging together.
One female won the  prize money we put together to give the best karaoke singer.
One male spent the whole time begging for treats like a dog and got us all laughing.
